open.title: No Connectivity | TTConnect Afrihost Network | Gauteng
open.description: We are investigating reports of no connectivity affecting clients on the TT Connect and Afrihost network. We are working on identifying and resolving this issue as quickly as possible. We apologise for any inconvenience that this may be causing.

updates.content: Afrihost and TT Connect continue to investigate issues on the TT Connect network. We are working with our upstream providers to resolve the issue as soon as possible. We apologize for the inconvenience caused by this.
Afrihost engineers have resolved the issue and we are currently monitoring for stability, if you are still experiencing issues, please restart your Fibre router.

Afrihost and its vendors continue to investigate issues on the TT Connect network. We are working with TT Connect and our upstream providers to resolve the issue as soon as possible. We apologize for the inconvenience caused.
Afrihost and TT Connect engineers are still working on resolving the issue as soon as possible. We apologize for the inconvenience caused.
